definitions.definition: The shelf above a fireplace which may be also a structural support for the masonry of the chimney .
A maneuver to surmount a ledge , involving pushing down on the ledge to bring up the body.

main_definition: The shelf above a fireplace which may be also a structural support for the masonry of the chimney .
secondary_definitions: ( climbing ) A maneuver to surmount a ledge , involving pushing down on the ledge to bring up the body.
